channel.title: Regional level on Climate Tools
channel.description: Recent content in Regional level on Climate Tools

item.title: Delaware Environmental Monitoring Sites
item.description: Developed By: DEMAC, Delaware Geological Survey, and University of Delaware

item.title: AdaptVA: Sea Level Rise Projection Viewer
item.description: Developed By: VIMS_CCRM Summary: The AdaptVA Sea Level Rise Projection Viewer uses an interactive map to display sea level rise projections for coastal Virginia.

item.title: AdaptVA: Tidewatch Map
item.description: Developed By: VIMS_CCRM Summary: The AdaptVA Tidewatch Map uses an interactive map to display coastal flooding in Virginia.

item.title: Climate Smart Farming: Apple Stage / Freeze Damage Probability
item.description: Developed By: Cornell University_College of Agriculture and Life Sciences Summary: Part of the Climate Smart Farming toolkit, the Apple Stage/Freeze Probability Tool predicts the potential freeze damage for 3 varieties of apple crops.

item.title: Climate Smart Farming: Grape Hardiness & Freeze Risk
item.description: Developed By: Cornell University_College of Agriculture and Life Sciences Summary: Part of the Climate Smart Farming toolkit, the Grape Freeze Risk Tool predicts the potential freeze damage for 3 varieties of grapes.

item.title: Climate Smart Farming: Growing Degree Day Calculator
item.description: Developed By: Cornell University_College of Agriculture and Life Sciences Summary: Part of the Climate Smart Farming toolkit, the Growing Degree Day Calculator calculates and plots observed and predicted growing degree days for a given location during a growing season.

item.title: Climate Smart Farming: Water Deficit Calculator
item.description: Developed By: Cornell University_College of Agriculture and Life Sciences Summary: Part of the Climate Smart Farming toolkit, the Water Deficit Calculator estimates soil water content within a crop’s effective root zone to predict potential water deficits and associated plant stress.

item.title: Climate Smart Farming: Winter Cover Crop Planting Scheduler
item.description: Developed By: Cornell University_College of Agriculture and Life Sciences Summary: Part of the Climate Smart Farming toolkit, the Winter Cover Crop Planting Scheduler calculates the probability that specific cover crops reach important levels of growth by the end of the growing season.

item.title: Creating Resilient Water Utilities: Resilient Strategies Guide for Water Utilities
item.description: Developed By: EPA Summary: Part of the Creating Resilient Water Utilities Tool (CRWU), the Resilient Strategies Guide is a beginner resource for water utilities working on a preliminary identification of adaptation strategies specific to their needs.

item.title: Eastern Virginia Coastal Resilience (ESVA Coastal Resilience)
item.description: Developed By: NOAA, and TNC Summary: The Virginia Eastern Shore Coastal Resilience tool is an interactive mapping tool that allows users to visualize potential social, economic, and environmental impacts of sea level rise and storm surge and identify areas for nature-based solutions to enhance resilience and reduce risks where possible.

item.title: Hampton Roads Geospatial Exchange Online: Hampton Roads Resilience Projects Dashboard
item.description: Developed By: HRPDC, HRSD, and HRTPO Summary: Part of the Hampton Roads Geospatial Exchange Online portal, this tool provides summary graphics and an interactive map to view current and proposed projects to improve resilience to flooding and coastal hazards in Hampton Roads, VA.

item.title: Hampton Roads Geospatial Exchange Online: Hampton Roads Sea Level Rise Planning Scenarios (Raster)
item.description: Developed By: HRPDC, HRSD, and HRTPO Summary: Part of Hampton Roads Geospatial Exchange Online, the Hampton Roads Sea Level Rise Planning Scenarios uses an interactive map to display sea level rise projections for Hampton Roads.

item.title: Know Your Zone
item.description: Developed By: VDEM Summary: The Know Your Zone tool is an interactive mapping tool that allows residents of coastal Virginia to determine their evacuation zone for hurricanes and severe storms.

item.title: MARISA Climate Data Portal: Climate Data for the Mid-Atlantic Region
item.description: Developed By: NOAA, and MARISA Summary: Climate Data for the Mid-Atlantic Region contains a list and overview of climate data products in the region.

item.title: MARISA Climate Data Portal: Interactive Map for the MARISA Region
item.description: Developed By: NOAA, and MARISA Summary: The Interactive Map for the MARISA region is an interactive web map that enables users to view real time climate data for the MARISA region.

item.title: MARISA Climate Impacts Summary and Outlook Reports
item.description: Developed By: MARISA Summary: The MARISA Climate Impacts Summary and Outlook Reports are a quarterly series summarizing seasonal weather and climate trends and forecasts for the Chesapeake Bay Watershed.

item.title: Mid-Atlantic Ocean Data Tool
item.description: Developed By: MARCO Summary: The Mid-Atlantic Ocean Data Portal is a resource center consisting of an interactive map, data layers, case studies, and collaborative tools that allows users to explore and share visualizations of coastal and societal resources from New York to Virginia.

item.title: Northeast Conservation Planning Atlas
item.description: Developed By: Conservation Biology Institute Summary: The Northeast Conservation Planning Atlas (CPA) is an online mapping platform where users can view, retrieve, and analyze spatial data for conservation planning in the Northeast US.

item.title: Operational Forecast System: Chesapeake Bay Operational Forecast System (CBOFS)
item.description: Developed By: NOAA Summary: The Chesapeake Bay Operational Forecast System (CBOFS) tool is a data viewer that provides real time forecasts of oceanographic conditions in the Chesapeake Bay.

item.title: Operational Forecast System: Delaware Bay Operational Forecast System (DBOFS)
item.description: Developed By: NOAA, and Rutgers University_Regional Ocean Modeling System Summary: The Delaware Bay Operational Forecast System (DBOFS) tool is a data viewer that provides real time forecasts of oceanographic conditions in the Delaware Bay.

item.title: Shoreline Assessment Mapper
item.description: Developed By: VIMS_CCRM Summary: The Shoreline Assessment Mapper is an interactive map that displays a variety of shoreline data for the coastal zone of Virginia.

item.title: Submerged Aquatic Vegetation (SAV) in the Chesapeake Bay
item.description: Developed By: VIMS Summary: The Submerged Aquatic Vegetation (SAV) in Chesapeake Bay tool provides access to recent and historical SAV monitoring data from the Virginia Institute of Marine Science SAV program.

item.title: USGS Geo Data Portal (GDP)
item.description: Developed By: USGS Summary: The USGS Geo Data Portal (GDP) is designed for advanced users looking to access meteorological, climate, and urban growth data at national and regional scales.

item.title: Virginia Coastal Geospatial and Educational Mapping System (GEMS)
item.description: Developed By: VDEQ Summary: The Virginia Coastal Geospatial and Educational Mapping System (Coastal GEMS) is an interactive map and inventory of coastal resource data and conservation planning tools for Virginia’s coastal zone.

item.title: Virginia Wetland Condition Assessment Tool (WetCAT)
item.description: Developed By: CCRM, and VDEQ Summary: The Virginia Wetland Condition Assessment Tool (WetCAT) is an interactive map that assesses wetland capacity to perform ecosystem services and provides the tools to conduct analyses useful for wetland restoration efforts.
